thread.title: Compile/Decompile APKtool Scripts Made Available for Windows
thread.title_full: Compile/Decompile APKtool Scripts Made Available for Windows

author: Doug Lynch
title: Compile/Decompile APKtool Scripts Made Available for Windows
text: XDA Recognized Themer cbucz24 along with the help of XDA Retired Forum Moderator dwitherell has released a few APKtool scripts for Windows. Theyâ€™ve been tested on Windows 10 and they come with two registry files to add options to the right-click context menu, and two batch files for quickly compiling and decompiling.
